startMentoringPanel.helpStudentWriteBett:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading to prompt the user to help a student with their solution.
**UI Location**: Mentoring request panel (H2 heading)
**When Users See This**: When a new mentoring request is displayed.
**Technical Context**: Variables `studentHandle` and `trackTitle` must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "Help {request.student.handle} write better {request.track.title}?"
startMentoringPanel.showThemWayToCodeBli:
**Functional Purpose**: Encouragement text for the user to start mentoring.
**UI Location**: Mentoring request panel (paragraph below heading)
**When Users See This**: When a new mentoring request is displayed.
**Technical Context**: Variable `studentHandle` must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "Feel you can help {request.student.handle} approach this in a better way? Start mentoring and show them the way to code bliss."
startMentoringPanel.startMentoring:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to initiate the mentoring session.
**UI Location**: Mentoring request panel (primary button)
**When Users See This**: When a new mentoring request is displayed.
**Technical Context**: Standard button text.
**Current English**: "Start mentoring"
startMentoringPanel.sessionReturnsToQueu:
**Functional Purpose**: Informational note about the time limit for mentoring a session.
**UI Location**: Mentoring request panel (note section)
**When Users See This**: When a new mentoring request is displayed.
**Technical Context**: Standard informational text.
**Current English**: "You have 30 minutes until the session returns to the queue for others to mentor."
startMentoringPanel.unableToLockSolution:
**Functional Purpose**: Error message indicating failure to lock the solution for mentoring.
**UI Location**: Mentoring request panel (error display)
**When Users See This**: If an error occurs when attempting to lock the solution.
**Technical Context**: This text is used to construct an error object if `error` is present.
**Current English**: "Unable to lock solution"
